organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: FIXTURES -

Let's think step by step.

1. FIFA (Fédération Internationale de Football Association) - International governing body for football (soccer)
2. Premier League - A professional football league in England
3. EFL (English Football League) - Operates English football leagues below the Premier League
4. FA Cup (Football Association Challenge Cup) - The oldest association football competition in the world
5. Carabao Cup (EFL Cup) - An annual knockout football competition in England for teams from the Premier League and the English Football League Championship and below.
6. UEFA (Union of European Football Associations) - European governing body for football
7. UEFA Champions League - An annual continental club football competition organized by UEFA since 1992
8. UEFA Europa League - An annual continental football competition organized by UEFA since 1971 for teams that do not qualify for the Champions League.

These organizations are involved in the administration, organization, and governance of football (soccer) competitions at the international, national, and league levels.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

1. FIFA (Fédération Internationale de Football Association) - International governing body for football
2. Premier League - A professional football league in England
3. EFL (English Football League) - Operates English football leagues below the Premier League
4. FA Cup (Football Association Challenge Cup) - Oldest association football competition in the world (The FA is the governing body of English football, but it is not explicitly stated as an organization in the paragraph)
5. UEFA (Union of European Football Associations) - European governing body for football

These organizations are the most relevant entities in the paragraph that can be clearly identified as organizations involved in the administration and governance of football competitions.
